sn17.7:1.3: diddhagatena visallena sallena → diṭṭhigatena visallena (si) | diṭṭhigatena sallena (s1-3, km) | diṭṭhagatena visallena sallena (pts1-2) | diṭṭhigatena visallena sallena (mr), sekhaṃ → bijjhatu sekhaṃ (bj) | sekkhaṃ (s1-3) | taṃ sekhaṃ (pts1-2, mr), anupāpuṇātu → anupāpuṇāti (pts1-2, mr)
